title: CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS - USD ($)$ in Millions

null.label: Total revenue
null.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

null.label: Cost of merchandise sold
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

Operating expenses:.label: Selling, general, and administrative
Operating expenses:.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Operating expenses:.label: Depreciation and amortization
Operating expenses:.definition: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Operating expenses:.label: Operating income
Operating expenses:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Operating expenses:.label: Interest expense, net
Operating expenses:.definition: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

Operating expenses:.label: Loss on extinguishment of debt
Operating expenses:.definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Operating expenses:.label: Income (loss) before income taxes
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Operating expenses:.label: Provision (benefit) for income taxes
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Operating expenses:.label: Net income (loss)
Operating expenses:.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Net income (loss) per share:.label: Basic
Net income (loss) per share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Net income (loss) per share:.label: Diluted
Net income (loss) per share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Net income (loss) per share:.label: Total revenue
Net income (loss) per share:.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Net income (loss) per share:.label: Total revenue
Net income (loss) per share:.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.
